snippet: In the Republican primary, candidates must contend with slate cards — voter guides of those endorsed by party organizations — which some say are “pay-to-play” operations.
lead_paragraph: In the Republican primary, candidates must contend with slate cards — voter guides of those endorsed by party organizations — which some say are “pay-to-play” operations.

headline.main: Trying to Weigh the Value of Voter Guides
headline.print_headline: Trying to Weigh the Value of Voter Guides
